author: Anonymous Poet
title: Lab 2 Q4 - last test case?
question:
I re-did Q4 of Lab 2, and was wondering if we need the fourth check-expect where both criteria are not satisfied (i.e. only "hi" is longer than n, but not "", and obviously, they don't have the same character at position n)? Because if both cases are false then the function will obviously produce false, so not sure if this test is necessary

Thank you for those who reminded me of this, I need to think twice and pay more attention to academic honesty policies before sharing any code on Piazza in the future.
